mapper.select: select count(*) cnt, DATE_FORMAT(visit_date, '%Y') ymd from visit group by DATE_FORMAT(visit_date, '%Y') order by ymd
select count(*) cnt, DATE_FORMAT(visit_date, '%Y-%m') ymd from visit where DATE_FORMAT(visit_date, '%Y') =#{visitDate} group by DATE_FORMAT(visit_date, '%Y-%m') order by ymd
select count(*) cnt, DATE_FORMAT(visit_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ymd from visit where DATE_FORMAT(visit_date, '%Y-%m') =#{visitDate} group by DATE_FORMAT(visit_date, '%Y-%m-%d') order by ymd
select count(*) cnt from visit where DATE_FORMAT(visit_date, '%Y-%m-%d') =DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
select 1 from visit where visit_ip = #{visitIp} and DATE_FORMAT(visit_date, '%Y-%m-%d') =DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
